cause.description:
HOW IN THE WORLD DOES ONE DESCRIBE CHOICES!!!???
CHIOCES IS SELF-LOVE, SELF-RESPECT, SELF-MOTIVATION.......SO MANY THINGS!!!
YOUR COMMENTS ARE ALL WELCOME! LEARN TP OPEN YOUR HEART AND LOVE 100%!!!!!
1. I CAN NOT HEAL OR CHANGE WHAT I DO NOT ACKNOWLEDGE!
2. BE COMMITTED TO DO WHAT IT TAKES TO HAVE WHAT YOU WANT!
3. CREATE MORE OF WHAT WORKS IN YOUR LIFE AND LESS OF WHAT DOESN'T!
4. ASK FOR WHAT YOU WANT!
5. LOOK THROUGH DIFFERENT GLASSES!
6. INTIMACY IN-TO-ME-SEE!
7. DISAGREEMENT IS NOT REJECTION!
8. IF BETTER IS POSSIBLE, IS GOOD GOOD ENOUGH!
9. FEAR IS THE OPPORTUNITY TO BE COURAGEOUS!
10. LIFE BEGINS OUTSIDE YOUR COMFORT ZONE!
11. STOP PLAYING SELF-DEFEATING GAMES!
cause.mission: CHANGE THE WORLD ONE HEART AT A TIME!
cause.name: CHOICES
